author: Staff Reporter
text:
A robber who entered a farmhouse in Oddanchatram near here was beaten to death on Wednesday. The deceased was M. Manikandan (25) of Kozhinjamparai in Palghat district in Kerala.

Police said that Manikandan entered the farmhouse owned by Sathyaseelan near Kuzhandhai Velappar Temple on Dindigul-Palani highway in the early hours of Wednesday and attempted to snatch a gold chain from S. Saraswathi, wife of Sathyaseelan, when she was sleeping.

On hearing her cry, farm workers and Sathyaseelan caught Manikandan and attacked him severely. He swooned on the spot.

Acting on an information, the police shifted him to Oddanchtram Government Hospital, where the doctors declared him dead.

Acting on a complaint, the police secured Sathyaseelan, his brother Anand and farm workers. Further investigation is on.

Earlier, Manikandan was working as lorry cleaner in Oddanchatram wholesale vegetable market.

He was dismissed by the owner as he was often involved in theft and other antisocial activities.
title: Robber beaten to death
